author: Temesvári, Pelbárt (1435?-1504)
title: Pomerium sermonum de beata Virgine, vel Stellarium corone beate Virginis fratris Pelbarti de Themeswar. - A la fin : Opus perutile Stellarium corone ejusdem Virginis intitulatum, impensis sumbtibusque providi viri Joannis Rynman de Oringau in imperiali
